appTitle: MEcfs-PAPERwork - ALPHA version (please report bugs on GitHub.)
appSubtitle: Paperwork for Myalgic Encephalomyelitis (ME/CFS) made easy. Secure in your browser - all data stays on your device.
feedbackIntro: Please do not include any patient or health data.
shareCopyInstructions: Copy the link below to share it.
shareCopiedDescription: The link has been copied to the clipboard.
formpackListDescription: Here you can see the currently available support offers. More are in progress. If you want to help, get in touch. All inputs are processed locally on your device and are optional.
formpackListEmpty: No support offers are available yet.
formpackListErrorFallback: Support offers could not be loaded right now.
formpackLoadError: This support offer could not be loaded right now.
formpackNotFound: This support offer was not found.
formpackUnsupported: This support offer uses a language that is not supported yet.
formpackInvalid: This support offer manifest is invalid.
formpackSchemaNotFound: The support offer schema file is missing.
formpackSchemaInvalid: The support offer schema file is invalid.
formpackSchemaUnavailable: The support offer schema could not be loaded.
formpackUiSchemaNotFound: The support offer UI schema file is missing.
formpackUiSchemaInvalid: The support offer UI schema file is invalid.
formpackUiSchemaUnavailable: The support offer UI schema could not be loaded.
formpackDocxErrorUnterminatedFor: DOCX template: A FOR loop is missing a matching END-FOR.
formpackDocxErrorIncompleteIf: DOCX template: An IF block is missing a matching END-IF.
formpackDocxErrorInvalidSyntax: DOCX template: The template syntax is invalid.
formpackDocxErrorInvalidCommand: DOCX template: A command is invalid or not properly closed.
profileSaveCheckbox: Save master data for future forms
profileDeleteConfirmPrompt: Do you want to delete previously saved master data now?
formpackFormNoActiveRecord: Select or create a draft to start entering data.
formpackRecordDeleteConfirm: Delete draft "{{title}}"? This cannot be undone.
formpackImportHint: Select a JSON export file to restore a draft.
formpackImportModeOverwriteHint: Select an active draft to enable overwrite.
formpackSnapshotsNoRecord: Select or create a draft to manage snapshots.
formpackSnapshotsClearAllConfirm: Delete all snapshots for this draft? This cannot be undone.
importInvalidJson: Invalid JSON. Please make sure the file is not corrupted and is in JSON format.
importUnknownFormpack: Unknown formpack. The file may come from a newer app version. Please update the app and try again.
importSchemaMismatch: The data does not match the current schema. The file may have been created with a different version. Try creating a new draft and transferring the data manually.
importInvalidPayload: The import data is incomplete or invalid. Please check that you selected the correct export file.
importFormpackMismatch: This JSON belongs to a different formpack. Please open the matching support offer and import the file there.
importInvalidRevisions: Snapshots in the JSON export are invalid. You can retry the import without snapshots by unchecking the "Import snapshots" option.
importUnsupportedLocale: The export uses an unsupported language. Re-export the data using a supported language (German or English).
importNoActiveRecord: Select an active draft before overwriting.
importOverwriteConfirm: The active draft will be overwritten. Do you want to continue?
importStorageError: Import could not be saved. Please try again.
storageUnavailable: Local storage is not available in this browser.
storageError: Could not access local storage. Please try again.
updateFormpacksAvailable: Formpacks were updated in the background.
updateAppAvailablePassive: A new app version is available. It will apply after restarting the app.
diagnosticsDescription: Create a support bundle with technical metadata (no personal data) for troubleshooting.
storageHealthGuidanceError: IndexedDB is not available. Data cannot be saved. This may happen in private/incognito mode or on some iOS browsers. Please use a regular browser mode.
storageHealthGuidanceWarning: Storage space is running low. Export and delete old drafts to free up space.
storageHealthGuidanceQuotaExceeded: Storage quota exceeded. Delete unused data or use a different browser.
resetAllDescription: Completely resets the app. All drafts, snapshots, caches, and settings will be permanently deleted.
resetAllConfirm: Permanently delete all local data? Drafts, snapshots, caches, and settings will be lost. This cannot be undone.
storageQuotaWarning: Storage space is running low. Export and delete old drafts to free up space.
storageQuotaError: Storage limit reached. Export your data and delete unused drafts.
